scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/community/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/community
  set jcr:title{String} to "Workday Community Site"
end

create service user workday-community-administrative-service-user
set ACL on /etc,/libs,/apps, /, /content/community,/home,/conf
    allow jcr:all for workday-community-administrative-service-user
    allow jcr:write for workday-community-administrative-service-user
end
